game.name: USFIV: Complete Brawler Pack (2011)
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: All alternate costumes for Zangief, E.Honda, Rufus, Abel and El Fuerte are included in this pack. Make these characters even more unique with these wild costumes!
game.shortDescriptionEn: All alternate costumes for Zangief, E.Honda, Rufus, Abel and El Fuerte are included in this pack. Make these characters even more unique with these wild costumes!
